subject: Old Project Documentation - Legacy System
textBody:
Hi John,

Here are the legacy system documentation files you requested. These documents contain the technical specifications and implementation details for the old system that was replaced last year.

Please note that these documents are for reference only as the system has been decommissioned.

Best regards,
Tech Support

Please review the attached completion documentation for your records.

Best regards,
Project Manager

Administrator

Best regards,
Training Team
